speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: That's like the tenth time I've peed since I've been here!

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: That's also like the tenth time you told us.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Yeah, oh I'm sorry, it must be really hard to hear! I tell ya, it's a lot easier having three babies play Bringing in the Noise, Bringing in da Funk on your bladder! I'm so sick of being pregnant! The only happiness I get is from a cup of coffee, which of course is decaf, 'cause-Oh! I'm pregnant!

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Pheebs, did...you want a cookie?

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Thank you so much.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: So uh, Pheebs, honey, how are those mood swings coming?

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: I haven't really had any yet.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Hey guys!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Hey.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Hey!

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: All right, here's the ring.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Yes! Yes! A thousand times, yes!

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: So uh, any ideas for the bachelor party yet?

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Whoa-whoa-whoa! Before you start handing out wedding rings and planning bachelor parties, don't you have to decide who your best man is gonna be?

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Oh, it's awkward. It's awkward. It's awkward.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: I sort've already asked Chandler.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: What?! He got to do it at your first wedding!

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Joey, I figured you'd understand. I mean, I-I've known him a lot longer.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Come on Ross! Look, I-I don't have any brothers; I'll never get to be a best man!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: You can be the best man when I get married.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: I'll never get to be a best man!

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Wait-wait, so, you get to be my best man twice and I never get to be yours at all?

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Oh no-no-no, you-yeah, of course you get to be my best man.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: What about me?! You-you just said I could!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: I'm not even getting married! Okay, this is a question for science fiction writers!

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: I can't believe you're not picking me.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Hey, how can it not be me?!HeyHey!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: I'm not even... I'm not even...

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Fine, y'know what, that's it. From now on, Joey, I want you to be my best man.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Yes! Shame about you man.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: This is what I've got going for the party so far, liquor wise. Get a lot of liquor.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Great. Great.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Okay, now uh, in terms of the invite list, I've got you, me, and Chandler and I'm gonna invite Gunther 'cause, well, we've been talking about this pretty loud.

speaker: ['Gunther']
transcript: I'll be there.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: All right-oh! Listen, I know this is your party, but I'd really like to the number of museum geeks that are gonna be there.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Yeah. Tell ya what, let's not invite any of the anthropologists, only the dinosaur dudes!

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Okay! We'll need a six-pack of Zima.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Hey guys, what are you doing?

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Oh, just planning my bachelor party with my best man.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Yeah, well, good luck trying to top the last one.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Yeah, see, I don't think it's gonna that difficult considering this one won't be taking place in the basement of a Pizza Hut.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Oh, I'm Ross. I'm Ross. I'm too good for the Hut; I'm too good for the Hut.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Look, I gotta go pick up Ben. Everything so far sounds great Joey, just remember to keep it on the mellow side, okay? Just a couple of guys hanging out playing poker, no-no strippers or anything okay?

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: You got it.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Okay, see ya later.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: See ya. Have fun planning your mellow bachelor party.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Well, there's gonna be strippers there. He didn't say anything about no strippers.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: He just said, "No strippers."

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Oh, I chose not to hear that.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Look what I got! Look what I got! Look what I got! Can you believe they make these for little people?

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Little village people.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Okay, look at this one. This is my favourite.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Oh, that is so sweet!

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: I know! Phoebe is gonna love dressing them in these!

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Huh. Except, Phoebe's not gonna be the one that gets to dress them.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Because she's not gonna get to keep the babies.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Oh my God! We are throwing the most depressing baby shower ever!

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Wait a minute! Unless, we give her all gifts she can use after she's done being pregnant. Like-like umm, regular coffee, Tequila.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Oh, and somebody can get those leather pants she's always wanted!

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Oh, she's gonna love that!

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: The stripper stole the ring!! The stripper stole the ring!! Chandler! Chandler, get up! Get up! The stripper stole the ring!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: What?

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: The ring is gone!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Ugh. Just a sec, give me a minute to wake up for this-Ah-ha-ha!! You lost the ring! You're the worst best man ever!

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Dude, this isn't funny! What am I gonna do?! I go to bed last night, everything's cool! I wake up this morning, the stripper's gone and the ring is gone!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: You slept with the stripper?

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Of course!!

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Hi, guys.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Hi! Phoebe.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Hi Phoebe.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: I-I wanted to apologise if I-y'know seemed a tad edgy yesterday at my shower. Y'know it's just the hormones, y'know.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: No we...

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Hormones.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: ...hormones, yeah.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Anyway, I just wanted to say thank you, it was just, it was so sweet.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Wow, you seem to be doing so much better. That's great. So how-how are things going?

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Good. Y'know-no-no, okay, it's-it feels like everything's been about me lately, so what's happening with you?

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Oh, well, actually we were just talking about me not going to Ross's wedding.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Oh!

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: It just might be too hard, given the history and all that...

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Wow! This reminds me of the time when I was umm, living on the street and this guy offered to buy me food if I slept with him.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Well, h-how is this like that?

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Well, let's see, it's not. Really, like that. Because, you see that was an actual problem, and uh, yours is just like y'know a bunch of y'know high school crap that nobody really gives y'know...

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: I'm-I'm sorry, I just thought that...

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Alrighty, here come the water works.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Ugh! I don't know what I'm going to do! I called the company that sent and th-they don't care! Then I called 9-1-1 and they laughed at me, if this isn't an emergency, then what is?

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Hey guys!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Hey!

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Hey...

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: I just wanted to thank you again for last night, what a great party! And the guys from work had a blast. Y'know, one of them had never been to a bachelor party before. Yeah! And-and another one had never been to a party before, so...

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: So uh, hey, that uh, that wedding ring, huh? Man, that's nice!

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Yeah, right!

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: I was uh, I was thinking I might want to pick one of those babies up for myself, I might want to get one of those...

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: That ring? When my grandmother first came to this country, that ring and the clothes on her back were all she had with her.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: So you might say, the ring is irreplaceable?

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Oh absolutely! It has been in my family for generations, and every bride who has worn it has had a long and happy life.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: So you might say, it's a magic ring.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Yeah, the stripper stole it.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: My-my ring? My-my wedding ring? The-the stripper stole my wedding ring?! H-how?! How could this all happen?!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Well, I think it all started when you said, "Hey Joey, why don't you be my best man."

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: All right-all right, fine! I-I'm gonna call the cops!

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Dude, I screwed up, you don't have to turn me in!

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Not on you! On the stripper!

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Oh, yeah, well I already did that! They said they're gonna look into it right after they solved all the murders.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Okay, well, we'll call the company that sent her!

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: I did that too! They wouldn't give me her real name or her number. They said, "If I bothered them again they'd call the police." I said, "If you talk to the police, you tell them I'm missing a ring!"

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: So what, Joey? Wh-wh-what? What are you telling me? That there's nothing we can do? Well, how could this happen?!

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Look Ross, I am so-so sorry. I-I-I...

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Well, what if we just ah, called her, used a fake name, and had her come to my office?

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Oh, that sounds like fun, but we've got a ring to find!!

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Here's your tea Phoebe.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: It's so good. Oh, thanks.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Good.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: I'm so glad you liked it.

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Oh!

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: What?!

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: What?! She made the tea!

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Oh! No, I-I think I just had a contraction.

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: You what?

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Oh my God!

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: Yeah, I thought I had one a couple of minutes ago, and now I know that was definitely one.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Wait, you can't have the baby here! I mean I haven't sterilised it since the guys moved out!

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Okay. It's okay. We're gonna be okay. Y'know what? It's okay. I'm gonna, I'm gonna, I'm gonna boil some water and just rip up some sheets!

speaker: ['Phoebe Buffay']
transcript: No. It's all right; it's probably false labour. They said that, that can happen near the end, just somebody get the book.

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: Rachel, get the book! The book!

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: Okay! Okay! Here!

speaker: ['Monica Geller']
transcript: The Bible?!

speaker: ['Rachel Green']
transcript: I don't know!

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: All right, okay, this is great, uh, Chandler, you get behind the desk. And-and when she comes in hopefully, she won't recognise you because, well, why would she? Uh, okay, and then you buzz Ross and I. You be Mr. Gonzalez, and I'll be uh, Mr. Wong.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Diverse.

speaker: ['The Stripper']
transcript: Did anybody call for security?

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: You be cool.

speaker: ['The Stripper']
transcript: Okay, which one of you guys is Gunther Central-Perk? Hey, Joey?

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Where's my ring? My dead grandmother's wedding ring? Where is it? Where is it?

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Way to be cool, man.

speaker: ['The Stripper']
transcript: What's he talking about?

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: There was a ring, in a box, on my nightstand, after you left, it was gone!

speaker: ['The Stripper']
transcript: Wait, you guys think I stole some ring?

speaker: ['The Guys']
transcript: Yeah!

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: We know you took so just-just save yourself the time and confess!

speaker: ['The Stripper']
transcript: Okay, who are you? The Hardy boys? Look, I don't need to steal some stupid ring, all right? I make $1,600 a week doing what I do; any of you guys make that?

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Marry me.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: If anything should happen to him...

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Joey! The vet said it's a simple procedure.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: So! Things can go wrong! You don't know! What if he doesn't make it?!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: He will, Joe.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Yeah, but what if he doesn't? He's such a good duck.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: I'm so worried about him, y'know?

speaker: ['The Doctor']
transcript: Somebody lose a ring?

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Oh my God! Thank you! Thank you so much!

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: H-h-h-how's the duck?

speaker: ['The Doctor']
transcript: He's doing just fine, he's resting now, but you can see him in a little bit.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Ohh, great! Oh hey, listen Ross, thanks for being so cool about this.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: No, that's all right.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: No, it's not. I mean you-you made me your best man and I totally let you down!

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Hey, come on, it's not your fault.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Yeah, it is! You wouldn't have lost the ring, right? Y'know what, Ross you were right from the start, he should be your best man.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: No, you should.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Now, don't argue with me...

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Hey! Hey! Hey! I get to choose my best man, and I want both you guys.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Really?

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: Really?

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Hey, both you guys should be up there with me. I mean, you two are-are my... I mean, I'm lucky to have just one good...

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: Thanks man.

speaker: ['Joey Tribbiani']
transcript: I gotta go check something over here.

speaker: ['Chandler Bing']
transcript: What a baby.

speaker: ['Ross Geller']
transcript: Total wuss!
